text.jpText:
『毎日王冠』当日。観客の注目は
メジロアルダン、オグリキャップ、
イナリワンの激突に集まっていた――
text.enText:
The day of "Mainichi-Oukan". All eyes were on 
the clash between Mejiro Aldan, Oguri Cap, 
and Inari One. Inari One, and the crowd was 
focused on the clash between

text.jpText:
そんな中メジロアルダンは、オグリキャップ、
スーパークリーク、イナリワンの3人を指し
『永世三強』と呼ぶ風潮の存在を語る。
text.enText:
Mejiro Aldan, however, speaks of a trend 
toward calling Oguri Cap, Super Creek, and 
Inari One the "Eternal Triumvirate. Mejiro 
Aldan talks about the existence of a tendency 
to call Oguri Cap, Super Creek, and Inari One 
the "Eternal Three.

coloredText.enText:
Japan's three antiquated philosophical 
schools of thought

text.jpText:
実に覆しがいのある呼び名だとして、
メジロアルダンは闘志を露にし、
三強の一角が集うレースに臨むのであった。
text.enText:
Mejiro Aldan, who was determined to overturn 
the name, was ready to fight. She was ready 
for a race that would bring together the best 
of three world powers.
